name: Night Out (MauriceEE)
description:
In this Daredevil-inspired wave-based arena game, play as a blind fighter who must conquer their disability to defeat the enemies and survive the night out. Utilize a variety of weapon and melee attacks to debilitate, overwhelm and defeat your foes. Overcome all challenges and become the devil that stops for no one!

Switch up the experience with Render Modes that change how the world looks, different wave sets to test your mettle, and various gameplay modifiers for a variety of fun challenges.

How it was designed
